articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: Russia ‘evacuates’ area around major nuclear plant in Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Wagner boss says mercenaries will continue to fight in Bakhmut, a U-turn from an earlier threat to withdraw.
articles.content: Hundreds of civilians on Sunday fled Ukrainian territories under Russian control as part of an “evacuation” ahead of what’s feared to be intense fighting around an area home to Europe’s largest nucle… [+1578 chars]
